name: Bunton, Appellant, v. Fidelity Trust Company et al.

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Hughes, JJ.
parties: Bunton, Appellant, v. Fidelity Trust Company et al.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
Tbe decree of tbe court below in tbe above-entitled case is affirmed on tbe opinion of Judge Thompson, costs to be paid by the appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Harry R. Bunton, in propria persona, appellant.
Robert D. Dalzell, with him Park J. Alexander and Dalzell, McFall, Pringle & Bredin, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Bunton, Appellant, v. Fidelity Trust Company et al.
Argued March 23,1944.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Hughes, JJ.
reargument refused May 25, 1944.
Harry R. Bunton, in propria persona, appellant.
Robert D. Dalzell, with him Park J. Alexander and Dalzell, McFall, Pringle & Bredin, for appellees.
April 10, 1944:
